00043 unsigned int InOutputAttribut::GetPeerId()
00044 {

00046         {
00047                 return comTool->GetServiceId();
00048         }
00049         return peerId;

00057 void InOutputAttribut::GenerateLongDescription(SimpleString& str)
00058 {
00059   TemporaryMemoryBuffer tmp(30);
00060 
00061   GenerateHeaderDescription(KindToStr(), GetName(), str, false);
00062 
00063   if(GetTcpPort() != 0)
00064     {
00065       snprintf(tmp, 30, "%d", GetTcpPort());
00066       str = str + "<tcp>"+tmp+"</tcp>";
00067     }
00068   if(GetUdpPort() != 0)
00069     {
00070       snprintf(tmp, 30, "%d", GetUdpPort());
00071       str = str + "<udp>"+tmp+"</udp>";
00072     }
00073 
00074         snprintf( tmp, 30, "%8.8x", comTool->GetServiceId() );
00075         str = str + "<peerId>" + tmp+ "</peerId>";
00076 
00077   AddTagDescriptionToStr(str);
00078   
00079   str = str + "<peers>";
00080   SimpleList<unsigned int> listPeer;
00081   if(comTool)
00082   {
00083           comTool->GetListPeerId(listPeer);
00084   }
00085   
00086   for( listPeer.First(); listPeer.NotAtEnd();  listPeer.Next())
00087     {
00088       snprintf(tmp, 30, "%08x",  listPeer.GetCurrent());
00089       str = str + "<peer>"+ tmp +"</peer>";
00090     }
00091   str = str + "</peers>";
00092 
00093   str = str + "</" + KindToStr() +">";
00094 
00095   listPeer.Empty();
00096 }

00098 void InOutputAttribut::GenerateRecordData(SimpleString& str)
00099 {
00100   // OmiscidTrace( "in InOutputAttribut::GenerateRecordData\n");
00101   // OmiscidTrace( "str before : |%s| \n", str.GetStr());
00102   // OmiscidTrace( "Tcp port (%p) : %d %d \n", comTool, GetTcpPort() ,comTool->GetTcpPort());
00103   TemporaryMemoryBuffer tmp(30);
00104 
00105   int tcp, udp;
00106 
00107   if(comTool == NULL)
00108     {
00109       tcp = tcpPort;
00110       udp = udpPort;
00111     }
00112   else
00113     {
00114       tcp = comTool->GetTcpPort();
00115       udp = comTool->GetUdpPort();
00116     }
00117       
00118   if(tcp != 0)
00119     {
00120       snprintf(tmp, 30, "%d", tcp);
00121       str = tmp;          
00122     }      
00123   if(udp != 0)
00124     {
00125       snprintf(tmp, 30, "%d", udp);
00126       str = str + "/" + tmp;
00127     }
00128 
00129   // OmiscidTrace( "str after : %s \n", str.GetStr());
00130   // OmiscidTrace( "out InOutputAttribut::GenerateRecordData\n");
00131 }

00133 const SimpleList<unsigned int>& InOutputAttribut::GetListPeerId()
00134 { 
00135   if(comTool)
00136     {
00137       listPeerId.Empty();
00138       comTool->GetListPeerId(listPeerId);
00139     }
00140   return listPeerId;
00141 }

00143 const SimpleString& InOutputAttribut::KindToStr() const
00144 {
00145         switch(kindOfInput)
00146         {
00147                 case AnInput:
00148                         return input_str;
00149 
00150                 case AnOutput:
00151                         return output_str;
00152 
00153                 case AnInOutput:      
00154                         return inoutput_str;
00155 
00156                 case UnkownConnectorKind:      
00157                         return unknown_str;
00158         }
00159 
00160         return SimpleString::EmptyString;
00161 }

00163 void InOutputAttribut::ExtractDataFromXml(xmlNodePtr node)
00164 {
00165   //parcours attributs
00166   xmlAttrPtr attr_name = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", node);
00167   if(attr_name)
00168     {
00169       SetName(SimpleString((const char*)attr_name->children->content));
00170     }
00171   
00172   //parcours child tag
00173   xmlNodePtr cur_node = node->children;
00174   for(; cur_node; cur_node = cur_node->next)
00175   {
00176           if (cur_node->type == XML_ELEMENT_NODE) 
00177           {
00178                   SimpleString cur_name = (const char*)cur_node->name;
00179                   if( cur_name == "description" )
00180                   {
00181                           SetDescription( XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children) );
00182                   }      
00183                   else if( cur_name == "formatDescription" )
00184                   {
00185                           SetDescription( XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children) );
00186                   }
00187                   else if ( cur_name == "tcp" )
00188                   {
00189                           SetTcpPort( (unsigned short)atoi(XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children).GetStr()) );
00190                   }
00191                   else if ( cur_name == "udp" )
00192                   {
00193                           SetUdpPort( (unsigned short)atoi(XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children).GetStr()) );
00194                   }
00195                   else if ( cur_name == "peerId" )
00196                   {
00197                           sscanf( XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children).GetStr(), "%x", &peerId );
00198                   }
00199                   else if ( cur_name == "peers" )
00200                   {
00201                           xmlNodePtr node_peer = cur_node->children;
00202                           for(; node_peer; node_peer = node_peer->next)
00203                           {
00204                                   if((node_peer->type == XML_ELEMENT_NODE) && strcmp((const char*)node_peer->name, "peer") == 0)
00205                                   {
00206                                           unsigned int ConnectedPeerId;
00207                                           sscanf( XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(node_peer->children).GetStr(), "%x", &ConnectedPeerId );
00208                                           AddPeer(ConnectedPeerId);
00209                                   }
00210                           }
00211                   }
00212                   else 
00213                   {
00214                           OmiscidError( "Unwaited Tag : %s\n", cur_name.GetStr() );
00215                   }
00216           }
00217   }
00218 }
